snippet.title: My Racing Game Demo Is Finished (Apex Rush)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Apex Rush on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638250/Apex_Rush/
It's finally finished... for now. Play Apex Rush here: https://realhazardous.itch.io/apex-rush

I had no prior experience of making games when I downloaded Unreal Engine 5 in February, since then I've been hard at work with this project.
This has been a really fun project learning something brand new and seeing it to the "final" product, that you can play.

Tutorial on how to Download & Run the game: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7all7Rzivg

Big thanks to 7HC for making the car model: 
https://www.instagram.com/ein7hc/
And thanks Jim Yosef providing the song "Time": 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9HY42FYWBHo

It's finally available to play, and I would love for you to try it! A contest will be launched on Monday over on my Discord server: https://discord.gg/mCZ59bDsFr

I hope you all enjoy this video & game. Drop a LIKE & Subscribe if you're new!
